resources.string: Please enter a valid email address
Please enter an at least 8 characters long password
Welcome to GeoLinker! This app helps you track and monitor your devices using real-time location data.
Your device ID is set as \"My Tracker\" - you can see this in the web app interface
View the map to see the current location and movement of your tracked devices
Interact with the map - zoom, pan, and tap on markers to see device details
Real-time tracking - See live updates of device locations on the map
View location history and movement patterns over time
Access settings and configure your tracking preferences
Use the floating action button (bottom right) to:
Go Back - Return to the previous page you viewed
Go Forward - Move to the next page in history (if available)
Refresh - Reload the current page to get the latest data
Go to Home - Return to the main GeoLinker dashboard
All navigation stays within the app - you won\'t be redirected to external browsers
Use the device back button to navigate through your browsing history
Refresh the page regularly to see the latest location updates
If you encounter any issues, use the Refresh option from the navigation menu
Are you sure you want to logout?
